location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Willock, Second Assistant to H M Mission, at Bushire, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Henry Willock, Second Assistant to H M Mission, at Bushire, to Lieutenant William Bruce, enclosing an extract of the instructions sent to Willock by Sir Harford Jones at Tahran [Tehran, Iran], empowering him to manage everything at Bushire regarding His Majesty's Mission at Teheran, until the arrival of Sir Gore Ouseley.
